body: I generated the sky mtx file in the first step: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/qZy0SSdaD2dc361dqLGygqXnxyPGHFT7vaVd0wutrUFN4tat3pV0llrs9U5cgks1-g7o1wECjdwpYP*rs3zuQL-oVQLleIUv/03.PNG) but the useOldRes_ input node doesn't read the sky matrix file already created once it's set as true: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/qZy0SSdaD2e0r*3jC0y1akEusMIhzFcHPgGmPNYFXOlESm33E*awXS7FuosE79bfp0uYmoXbqMcPdETk-2nn3RObOeSadabQ/04.PNG) May I ask if I miss anything here? THank you!
topic: useOldRes_ in the genCumulativeSkyMtx component doesn't read sky mtx file already created

replies.body:
Grasshope,

May i ask you how do you know it is not reading it?

From your second image you need to set the runIt to True. Otherwise it won't do anything.

-A.
